properties.title: Sea Breeze Villa
properties.description: Enjoy a luxurious stay near the beach with private pool access and a garden view.

properties.title: Hilltop Cottage
properties.description: A peaceful cottage nestled in the Nilgiris, perfect for romantic getaways.

properties.title: Urban Apartment
properties.description: Modern apartment with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and workspace. Ideal for digital nomads.

properties.title: Desert Retreat
properties.description: Rustic retreat in the heart of the Thar desert with camel rides and folk music.

properties.title: Lake View House
properties.description: Scenic views of Naini Lake from the balcony, cozy interiors, and fireplace.

properties.title: Coastal Studio
properties.description: Artistic studio room with French colonial vibe, walkable distance to beach cafes.

properties.title: Forest Cabin
properties.description: Surrounded by tea plantations, this cabin offers unmatched tranquility and nature sounds.

properties.title: City Loft
properties.description: Stylish loft in the heart of the city with skyline views, smart appliances, and security.

properties.title: Backwater Bungalow
properties.description: Traditional bungalow floating in the backwaters, includes boat rides and meals.
